verbose_text: To clarify the possible mechanisms by which puerarin attenuated DEX induced apoptosis, western blot analysis and RT-qPCR were performed to examine a panel of apoptosis associated proteins, including Bcl-2, Bax, caspase-3 and cytochrome c.
evidence: puerarin attenuated DEX-induced apoptosis, western blot analysis and RT-qPCR were performed to examine a panel of apoptosis-associated proteins, including Bcl-2
